InstructionData.Title: WallheaterAutomate
InstructionData.Author: Rizzard of Oz
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias tempSensor d0 alias wallHeater d1 alias currTemp r0 alias maxTemp r1 alias minTemp r2
#set the max and min temps we want to maintain add maxTemp 298 0 add minTemp 292 0
#start behavior routines:
#routine for below min and max temp belowMinTemp: s wallHeater On 1 belowMinTemploop: sleep 1 l currTemp tempSensor Temperature ble currTemp maxTemp belowMinTemploop j maxTempReached
#routine for when max temp reached maxTempReached: s wallHeater On 0 maxTempLoop: sleep 1 l currTemp tempSensor Temperature #turn heater off until min heat reached bge currTemp minTemp maxTempLoop j belowMinTemp
